app.title: Ren'Py Visual Editor
button.createNewProjectDesc: Start building your next Ren'Py visual novel project
login.title: Login
login.error: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
register.title: Register
editor.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please select a .rpy file.
editor.openOrCreate: Open a .rpy file or create a new script
editor.missingProjectId: Project ID is required. Please access editor from project page.
editor.failedToLoadProject: Failed to load project. Please check if you have access to this project.
editor.projectNotFound: Project not found or access denied
editor.noProjectSelected: No project selected. Please select a project first.
project.name: Project Name
project.manage.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the project "{{projectName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
errors.failedToDeleteProject: Failed to delete project. Please try again.
project.noMembersYet: No members yet. Add someone to collaborate!
editor.nodeEditor.title: Node Editor — lines {{start}}–{{end}}
editor.indentError: Found a line with smaller indent (line {{line}}). Indents not changed.
editor.errorMissingNodeLines: Node data is missing start or end lines
editor.errorSaveNoContext: Failed to determine context for saving
editor.errorMissingLines: Failed to determine line range for editing
editor.globalEditorNotImplemented: Global editor functionality not yet implemented
editor.branchToolInvalidNode: Branches can only be added to action blocks.
editor.branchInsertError: Failed to insert branch. Please try again.
branchMenuDialog.title: Insert menu after {{nodeName}}
branchMenuDialog.description: Define the choices that will be inserted after this node.
branchMenuDialog.jumpHelper: Leave blank to add a TODO placeholder for this branch.
branchMenuDialog.notesHelper: Notes are added as comments above the option.
branchMenuDialog.optionError: Please enter text for this option.
branchConditionDialog.title: Insert condition after {{nodeName}}
branchConditionDialog.description: Configure an if/elif/else structure to branch from this point.
branchConditionDialog.pseudoInfo: Pseudo conditions are allowed and will be stored as comments for later refinement.
branchConditionDialog.ifHelper: Provide the condition to evaluate (can be a pseudo expression).
branchConditionDialog.elseHelper: Provide placeholder lines that will appear inside the else block.
branchConditionDialog.notesHelper: Notes are inserted as comments within the branch.
landing.hero.title: Ren'Py visual editor
landing.hero.subtitle: Write branching stories without wrestling with script files
landing.hero.description: Move dialogue around as nodes on the canvas and let the editor handle Ren'Py syntax, structure, and formatting while you and your co writers focus on the story
landing.badges.twoWay: Keep graph and Ren'Py in sync
landing.badges.wysiwyg: Edit dialogue directly on the graph
landing.cards.visualFirst.title: Write by moving nodes
landing.cards.visualFirst.text: Build routes by dragging bubbles on the canvas while the editor keeps track of where every line lives in the Ren'Py file
landing.cards.twoWay.title: Graph and script stay synced
landing.cards.twoWay.text: Jump between the visual graph and raw Ren'Py whenever you like and the structure and formatting stay familiar for the whole team
landing.cards.collab.title: Built for co writing
landing.cards.collab.text: See who is in the scene with you, share projects safely, and avoid merge drama when several writers touch the same script
landing.cards.confidence.title: Operational confidence
landing.cards.confidence.text: FastAPI backend, auth, project storage, uploads/downloads, and SQLite persistence ready for teams.
landing.realtime.title: Ready for live work
landing.realtime.description: Use the same project from different machines and keep the graph together with WebSocket updates and project level access control
landing.realtime.ready: Want to try it on your script?
